org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.process.traversal.step

Interface Scoping

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddEdgeStep, AddPropertyStep, AddVertexStartStep, AddVertexStep, DedupGlobalStep, MatchStep, MatchStep.MatchEndStep, MatchStep.MatchStartStep, SelectOneStep, SelectStep, WherePredicateStep, WhereTraversalStep, WhereTraversalStep.WhereEndStep, WhereTraversalStep.WhereStartStep

    public interface Scoping
    This interface is implemented by Step implementations that access labeled path steps, side-effects or Map values by key, such as select('a') step. Note that a step like project() is non-scoping because while it creates a Map it does not introspect them.
    Author:
    Marko A. Rodriguez (http://markorodriguez.com), Stephen Mallette (http://stephen.genoprime.com)
